properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a new post on Google Business Profile

properties.name: account
properties.description: The Google Business Profile account

properties.name: location
properties.description: The specific location or business associated with the account

properties.name: postType
properties.description: The type of post to create (standard, event, offer, or alert)

properties.name: summary
properties.description: The main text of the post

properties.name: title
properties.description: E.g. Sales this week.

properties.name: startDateTime
properties.description: The start date and time of the event

properties.name: endDateTime
properties.description: The end date and time of the event

properties.name: title
properties.description: E.g. 20% off in store or online.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: The start date of the offer

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: The end date of the offer

properties.name: alertType
properties.description: The sub-type of the alert

options.name: Covid 19
options.description: This alert is related to the 2019 Coronavirus Disease pandemic

properties.name: additionalOptions
properties.description: The language code of the post content. More info.

options.name: languageCode
options.description: The language code of the post content. More info.

options.name: callToActionType
options.description: The type of call to action

options.name: Action Type Unspecified
options.description: Type unspecified

options.name: Book
options.description: This post wants a user to book an appointment/table/etc

options.name: Call
options.description: This post wants a user to call the business

options.name: Learn More
options.description: This post wants a user to learn more (at their website)

options.name: Order
options.description: This post wants a user to order something

options.name: Shop
options.description: This post wants a user to browse a product catalog

options.name: Sign Up
options.description: This post wants a user to register/sign up/join something

options.name: url
options.description: The URL that users are sent to when clicking through the promotion

options.name: couponCode
options.description: The coupon code for the offer

options.name: redeemOnlineUrl
options.description: Link to redeem the offer

options.name: termsConditions
options.description: The terms and conditions of the offer

notice.name: notice

notices.name: notice
notices.text: Make sure that the updated options are supported by the post type. More info.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
